# API Reference for cdktf.ISynthesisSession

   ISynthesisSession <a name="ISynthesisSession" id="cdktf.ISynthesisSession"></a>
  
  - *Implemented By:* <a href="#cdktf.ISynthesisSession">ISynthesisSession</a>
  
  Represents a single session of synthesis.
  
  Passed into `TerraformStack.onSynthesize()` methods.
  originally from aws/constructs lib v3.3.126 (synth functionality was removed in constructs v10)
  
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ISynthesisSession.property.manifest">Manifest</a></code> | <code><a href="#cdktf.Manifest">Manifest</a></code> | *No description.* |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ISynthesisSession.property.outdir">Outdir</a></code> | <code>string</code> | The output directory for this synthesis session. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ISynthesisSession.property.skipValidation">SkipValidation</a></code> | <code>bool</code> | *No description.* |
